title: 'I'm staying': Max Verstappen confirms his F1 future at Red Bull
summary: Max Verstappen has sought to end speculation about his F1 future with Red Bull by announcing that he will stay with the team in 2026

qa_pairs.question: In which year did Max Verstappen confirm he would stay with Red Bull Racing?
What team is Max Verstappen currently driving for as of his announcement?
What is a common reason for drivers to announce their future plans in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To end speculation about their contracts
